title: Spinach and Ricotta Cannelloni Bake
ingredients: ['400g ricotta cheese', '250g frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1 egg', '2 teaspoons freshly chopped parsley', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '180g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '40g grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 or 3 jars pasta sauce', '350ml water', '1 (250g) box cannelloni pasta tubes']
